General.Name: Lincoln Ventures Ltd
General.Description: Lincoln Ventures Ltd. focuses on seeking new opportunities. Previously, the company was involved in the manufacture and distribution of advanced composite materials. The company was formerly known as TekModo Industries Inc. and changed its name to Lincoln Ventures Ltd. in July 2018. Lincoln Ventures Ltd. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 669 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 0B4
